Articles.Content:
A Viper MK2 modified to fly in Kerbin's Atmosphere
Press 1: Toggle Boost
Press 2: Toggle Main Thrusters
Press 3: Deploy landing chutes

Install instructions: Extract to 'C:\Users\[user]\AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2\Saves\SinglePlayer\[Campaign Name]\Workspaces'

Image Preview: https://imgur.com/a/PXhuOE

Download Link: https://www.mediafire.com/file/f8vb6laot159are/ViperMKII.rar/file
